task.title: Importing a Pipeline
task.shortdesc: Import a pipeline to use a pipeline developed on a different or to restore a backup file. Import a pipeline from a pipeline file. Pipeline files are JSON files exported from another .

context.p: When you import a pipeline, you create a pipeline and then import the pipeline. When you import a pipeline, you can choose to overwrite the existing pipeline or use the import to create an additional pipeline.

step.cmd: In the Pipeline library, click the Actions icon for the pipeline, and then click Import.
To import the pipeline in the current canvas, in the Import Pipeline window, click Overwrite Pipeline to overwrite the existing pipeline. Browse to the pipeline file and click Import.

To keep the current pipeline click Create New Pipeline and Import. In the New Pipeline dialog box, enter a pipeline name and optional description, and then browse to the pipeline file and click Import.
